DOC.brief_summary: This phase 1 , multicenter , open-label study design find RP2D volasertib , PLK1 inhibitor , belinostat , HDAC inhibitor , give combination patient relapse refractory B-cell T-cell lymphoma . A standard 3+3 dose-escalation design employ study enrollment begin dose level 1 .
